    FedoraRepositoryImport

    @Scope(value="prototype")
@Path(value="/{path: .*}/fcr:import")
public class FedoraImport
extends FedoraBaseResource
    Import serialized objects at a given endpoint

    • Method Detail

      • importObject

        @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response importObject(@PathParam(value="path")
                                          String externalPath,
                                          @QueryParam(value="format")@DefaultValue(value="jcr/xml")
                                          String format,
                                          InputStream requestBodyStream)
                                       throws IOException,
                                              org.fcrepo.kernel.exception.InvalidChecksumException,
                                              URISyntaxException
        Deserialize a serialized object at the current path POST /fcr:import?format=jcr/xml (with a JCR/XML payload)
        Parameters:
        externalPath - the external path
        format - the format
        requestBodyStream - the request body stream
        Returns:
        201 with Location header to the path of the imported resource
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO exception occurred
        org.fcrepo.kernel.exception.InvalidChecksumException - if invalid checksum exception occurred
        URISyntaxException - if uri syntax exception
